text: Olga Vyalikova (26 March 1954 – 15 July 2019) was a Russian film and theater actress. She graduated from the Boris Schukin Theatre Institute in 1975. ==Filmography== *1978 — Любовь моя, печаль моя *1978 — An Ordinary Miracle *1982 — Похождения графа Невзорова *1983 — И жизнь, и слёзы, и любовь *2004 — Долгое прощание ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Russian actresses
title: Olga Vyalikova
